_instructions.description: This is a template for creating form configurations. Remove this '_instructions' section before importing.

field_descriptions.id: Unique identifier for the form (required, must be unique)
field_descriptions.title: Display title of the form (required)
field_descriptions.description: Brief description shown on form list (optional)
field_descriptions.welcome_message: Message shown when starting the form (optional)
field_descriptions.sections: Array of form sections, each containing questions

questions.title: The question text (required)
questions.is_required: Whether the question must be answered (boolean)
questions.allow_comment: For likert questions, allow additional comments (boolean)
questions.help_text: Additional help or context for the question (optional)
questions.charLimit: Character limit for text/textarea questions (optional, number)
questions.rows: Number of rows for textarea questions (optional, number)

question_types.likert: 5-point Likert scale (Strongly Disagree to Strongly Agree)
